short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension which shows a developer's email on their profile page (if not there already) by searching their commits.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever wanted to find a user's GitHub email but not sure where to look? Look no further, this extension can help you! Using public event data (i.e. commits pushed to public repositories), this extension grabs a user's commit email and surfaces it on their profile page.

It also adds a handy copy to clipboard button to make it easier to grab.

Download this extension to save yourself time and get in touch with developers faster!
